title: Minecraft 1.8.4 Cracked [Auto Installer] [Online] [Server List]
description:
TagCraftMC's Minecraft launcher (LV 1.75/ MC 1.8.4 With Optifine) Windows Only.

--Info on Installation and running Minecraft--
Download the torrent.
Run the auto installer.
Use the desktop icon to run Minecraft
Type in the name you want for Minecraft.
Click the launch Minecraft Button.

If you have any problems with the installation or running Minecraft please don't hesitate to leave us a message at our forums.

--Info on Joining a Multiplayer Server--
When Minecraft loads up, press the Multiplayer button.
Choose our server or join your own.
If youre going to join our server, we currently offer, Factions (PVP and non PVP), Hunger Games, Creative, Quake (Insta kill death match arena) and soon to come is a survival wave based zombie game mode and MarioKart races. To join any of these servers you will need to register a password for your account. You can do this with the command /register makeapassworduphere.

If you need help with joining our server please visit www.tagcraftmc.com/firsttime

--Extra Info--
Our launcher allows you to select different versions of Minecraft as well as mods.
Youre able to install mods on our client just like you would on normal Minecraft or you can just use our Minecraft Update feature and install a MC version with a modpack installed.

Our client also allows you to dedicate the desired amount of ram you want to your client.

We have also added an auto update feature to the launcher, if there is an update available it will ask if you want to download it.


--Warning--
We will no longer be including the legacy (pre 1.7.2) assets (files) in the future releases of these torrents.
Not including it will drop the file size to ~130MB.
